title: @Art Team: A Question about New Skin Splash Arts
body:
I remember reading in the Shen update that new splashes would be incorporated along with gameplay updates. This makes perfect sense considering the outdated nature of most splashes post-rework. 

This is my question though: will splash arts that are for champions not slated for reworks (Karthus, Rammus, Kennen, etc.) be updated at some point like the 2 Yi splashes (Chosen and Assassin) that were updated few months ago?

replies.body: Of course! Just because a champion isn't slated for a champion update doesn't mean that they'll be left in the dust. Unfortunately, I don't have info to share regarding who/when.
I assumed that would be the case, but you never know. Thanks!
Did that sound mad or something?
Nah, it's just a thumbs up! :D
Ah OK. I thought it was a sweat drop.
